intro:
Welcome to the thrilling game House of Haunted Memes!
The objective of the game is to leave the house but you will be obstructed by memes!
Use your wit to find your way through the house and past the memes.
help:
THINGS YOU SHOULD KNOW:
LOOK ROOM: This command helps to see items and changes to a room
Go <room name>: This command will take you to different rooms
Get <item name>: Get an item that's available in the room
Use <item name>: Allows an item to be used
Look <item name>: gives you further detail about the item.
Save:Saves the current game status
Music <Command>: Stop, start, up, down. 
Quit: Quits the game, #EmotionalDamage
Where Am I: Shows you a map of the room with a visual of exits available
begin story:
You are walking along, on your way to work as you pass by that creepy house on the corner.
From inside you hear odd noises and see smoke coming from the windows
As the good samaritan that you are you grab an old rusty bucket by the door that's conveniently full of water.
Right as you dash through the entry way, the door SLAMS shut behind you and you hear a CLICK as it locks.
Try as you might you can't open the door, the only way out is forward...
win text:
As you deal the final blow to the meme lord's made up monster the meme lord smiles.
Thank you for playing one last game with me, now I can finally leave this house in peace.
His ghost dissolves into a fine bright mist and you shed a single tear.
You hear a loud 'CLICK' from the hallway and realize you are free to go.....
Well you still have to go to work, so off to your day job I guess.
lose text:
The meme lord sneers at you.
'THIS GAME IS SO EASY A CHILD COULD WIN IT!!, You will never leave this house, you will stay here and become one of my memes...'
You die and become a ghost for one of the rooms...And this dear friends is how bad luck brian was born.

items.coffee mug:
The coffee mug has the words worlds greatest.... with the rest of the words smudged away.
It seems to be half full of piping hot coffee.
items.dice:
My dice don't jiggle jiggle they roll.
These are some sweet shiny dice!!
items.catnip:
The most exquisite, finely plated catnip to exist in the metaverse.
It would make any lucky cat the happiest cat in the world.
items.bucket: This bucket is shloppin around, full of water. Looks pretty splashable to me.
